message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CL 

The paper presents a novel appearance-based loop-closure detection method that uses bag-of-words (BoW) scheme based on binary descriptors. This method is validated using several indoor and outdoor public datasets, taken under different environmental conditions. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is computer vision (cs.CV), followed by robotics (cs.RO) and machine learning (cs.LG, cs.AI). The paper also mentions the use of Bayesian frameworks, which falls under natural language processing (cs.CL).
